Title: Lennox Schedules Third Quarter Results
Summary: DALLAS , Oct. 6, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Lennox (NYSE: LII), a leader in energy-efficient climate control solutions, will report third quarter 2025 financial results before the market opens on Wednesday, Oct 22, 2025 . An earnings conference call and webcast are scheduled for the same day at 8:30 a.m.

Summary: DALLAS , Sept. 19, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The Lennox (NYSE: LII) board of directors approved a quarterly cash dividend of $1.30 per share of common stock, payable October 15, 2025 , to stockholders of record as of September 30, 2025 .
